WorkflowInfo.Name: Download and Monitor FTP file download
WorkflowInfo.Description: Download and Monitor FTP file download
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process monitors the progress of downloading a file from the FTP servers, by comparing the current size with the file size 30 seconds before, until they are identical, and sends an alert when the download is completed.  You can schedule this process to run daily in a specific time if you are expecting a file to complete download within a fixed time frame.
